name: positive-thoughts
description: A website where you can go to get daily inspirational quotes and save them

scripts.start: concurrently " cd server && npm start" " cd client && npm start"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Matthew Hodges, Lucia Gil, Sean Conrad, Michael Andrews, Jason South
